data.caption: Clarification On Volume Movement
data.news_body: The company has filed all relevant disclosures with the Exchange as required and there is no change in any information nor there are any impending announcements as on date except those filed with the Exchanges which in the opinion of company may have bearing on the price/volume behavior of its securities. The trading window for the designated persons and their immediate relatives is also closed from 01.07.2025 till 48 hours of declaration of companys results for 01st quarter ended 30.06.2025. Therefore the volume movement is purely due to market conditions and apparently market driven on which the company neither has any control nor has any knowledge of reasons thereof and since the shares are freely traded on the exchange platform the company has no comment to offer on the volume movement of its securities.

data.caption: Clarification sought from Ddev Plastiks Industries Ltd
data.news_body:
The Exchange has sought clarification from Ddev Plastiks Industries Ltd on July 15 2025 with reference to Movement in Volume

The reply is awaited.

data.caption: Corporate Action-Board to consider Dividend
data.news_body: The board of directors at its meeting held on 15.05.2025 recommended final dividend of Rs. 1.75/- per equity share of Rs.1/- each (@175%) for financial year ended 31.03.2025 subject to approval of members at the ensuing Annual General Meeting.

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Dividend Updates
data.news_body: The Board of Directors at its meeting held on 15-05-2025 recommended Final Dividend of Rs. 1.75 per equity share of Rs. 1/- each (@175%) subject to approval of members at the ensuing Annual General Meeting.
